mapper.select: select u.id, u.account, u.name, u.password, role.name 'role_name', r.name 'restaurant_name' from user u LEFT JOIN role on role.id = u.role_id LEFT JOIN restaurant r on r.id = u.restaurant_id ORDER BY u.id

select u.id, u.account, u.name, u.password, role.name 'role_name', r.name 'restaurant_name' from user u LEFT JOIN role on role.id = u.role_id LEFT JOIN restaurant r on r.id = u.restaurant_id where u.role_id = '2'
and u.account like concat('%',#{account},'%')
and u.name like concat('%',#{name},'%')
ORDER BY u.id
